title: Big Bend National Park: Stories
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Stories               Stories        Rusted Enamel Pan NPS Photo/Matthew Yarbrough   Â    Big Bend, with its long and rich cultural history, is home to many stories, tales and legends. While almost all the stories told contain some degree of truth and authenticity many of the tales and legends from the region are probability more fiction then fact.  Human history in this harsh desert environment is a complex blend of cultures, boundaries, and the limits of economic and personal adventures.
